heading: tornado hits utah
subheading: at least one person was killed and more than a hundred injured when a rare tornado struck hit salt lake city on wednesday. the downtown area looked like a war zone, with overturned trucks, uprooted trees, downed power lines, and streets littered with broken glass. the twister struck without warning, flattening tents pitched for an outdoor retail show near the salt palace convention center. it damaged the roof of the delta center, home of the utah jazz, and blew windows out of the wyndham hotel.
author: wired staff
text: at least one person was killed and more than a hundred injured when a rare tornado struck hit salt lake city on wednesday. the downtown area looked like a war zone, with overturned trucks, uprooted trees, downed power lines, and streets littered with broken glass. the twister struck without warning, flattening tents pitched for an outdoor retail show near the salt palace convention center. it damaged the roof of the delta center, home of the utah jazz, and blew windows out of the wyndham hotel.
